display.title: How would I boost my processing power?
description: Multiple &&don-tier machines&&r are never a bad idea, but you should definitely consider using the Large multiblock variants of the singleblock machines from &&aGregicality Multiblocks&&r. They're significantly easier to upgrade as you progress through the later tiers of the mod (would you rather make a &&616A LuV Energy Hatch&&r, or &&b16 LuV Macerators&&r?!), and plus... they look rad as hell.
